# VisionError.pixelBufferCreationFailed(_:)

**Case**

An error that indicates a problem occurs when creating a pixel buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
case pixelBufferCreationFailed(CVReturn)
```

## Getting the error

- **VisionError.internalError(_:)**: An error that indicates the framework produces an internal error.
- **VisionError.ioError(_:)**: An error that indicates an I/O problem for an image, image sequence, or Core ML model.
- **VisionError.operationFailed(_:)**: An error that indicates the operation you request fails.
- **VisionError.outOfBoundsError(_:)**: An error that indicates an app attempts to access data that’s out-of-bounds.
- **VisionError.outOfMemory(_:)**: An error that indicates there’s not enough memory to perform the operation.
- **VisionError.requestCancelled(_:)**: An error that indicates an app cancels the request.
- **VisionError.timeStampNotFound(_:)**: An error that indicates the system can’t find a timestamp.
- **VisionError.timeout(_:)**: An error that indicates an operation times out.
